member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.InvalidRequest
member.summary: The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.UnauthorizedClient
member.summary: The client is not authorized to request an authorization code using this method.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.AccessDenied
member.summary: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.UnsupportedResponseType
member.summary: The authorization server does not support obtaining an authorization code using this method.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.InvalidScope
member.summary: The requested scope is invalid, unknown, or malformed.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.ServerError
member.summary: The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request. (This error code is needed because a 500 Internal Server Error HTTP status code cannot be returned to the client via an HTTP redirect.)

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.TempUnavailable
member.summary: The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server. (This error code is needed because a 503 Service Unavailable HTTP status code cannot be returned to the client via an HTTP redirect.)

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.InteractionRequired
member.summary: The Authorization Server requires End-User interaction of some form to proceed. This error MAY be returned when the prompt parameter value in the Authentication Request is none, but the Authentication Request cannot be completed without displaying a user interface for End-User interaction.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.LoginRequired
member.summary: The Authorization Server requires End-User authentication. This error MAY be returned when the prompt parameter value in the Authentication Request is none, but the Authentication Request cannot be completed without displaying a user interface for End-User authentication.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.AccountSelectionRequired
member.summary: The End-User is REQUIRED to select a session at the Authorization Server. The End-User MAY be authenticated at the Authorization Server with different associated accounts, but the End-User did not select a session. This error MAY be returned when the prompt parameter value in the Authentication Request is none, but the Authentication Request cannot be completed without displaying a user interface to prompt for a session to use.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.ConsentRequired
member.summary: The Authorization Server requires End-User consent. This error MAY be returned when the prompt parameter value in the Authentication Request is none, but the Authentication Request cannot be completed without displaying a user interface for End-User consent.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.InvalidRequestUri
member.summary: The request_uri in the Authorization Request returns an error or contains invalid data.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.InvalidRequestObject
member.summary: The request parameter contains an invalid Request Object.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.RequestNotSupported
member.summary: The OP does not support use of the request parameter defined in Section 6.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.RequestUriNotSupported
member.summary: The OP does not support use of the request_uri parameter defined in Section 6.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.AuthorizationRequestProcessingError.RegistrationNotSupported
member.summary: The OP does not support use of the registration parameter defined in Section 7.2.1.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.TokenRequestProcessingError.InvalidRequest
member.summary: The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.TokenRequestProcessingError.InvalidClient
member.summary: Client authentication failed (e.g., unknown client, no client authentication included, or unsupported authentication method). The authorization server MAY return an HTTP 401 (Unauthorized) status code to indicate which HTTP authentication schemes are supported. If the client attempted to authenticate via the "Authorization" request header field, the authorization server MUST respond with an HTTP 401 (Unauthorized) status code and include the "WWW-Authenticate" response header field matching the authentication scheme used by the client.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.TokenRequestProcessingError.InvalidGrant
member.summary: The provided authorization grant (e.g., authorization code, resource owner credentials) or refresh token is invalid, expired, revoked, does not match the redirection URI used in the authorization request, or was issued to another client.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.TokenRequestProcessingError.UnauthorizedClient
member.summary: The client is not authorized to request an authorization code using this method.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.TokenRequestProcessingError.UnsupportedGrantType
member.summary: The authorization grant type is not supported by the authorization server.

member.name: F:MyAuth.OAuthPoint.Client.Models.TokenRequestProcessingError.InvalidScope
member.summary: The requested scope is invalid, unknown, or malformed.
